title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Net income in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, roughly decreasing from 2009 to 2011, gradually increasing from 2011 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and lastly slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018.
The line rapidly increased by 188.38% from Year 2011 to 2012, and lastly, increased by 75.9% from Year 2016 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Maximum Net income in million U.S. dollars, about 1907.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Net income in million U.S. dollars, of value 198.0 was reported at Year 2011
